title: verify_kis_api_authentication_and_token_generation
description: Test that KIS API authentication tokens are correctly generated and used for all API calls to ensure secure and authorized access.

title: validate_trader_core_price_and_balance_retrieval
description: Verify that the Trader Core module correctly fetches current prices and balances for assets TQQQ, SHV, and SCHD from the KIS API, and handles zero buying power errors gracefully.

title: test_fallback_to_yahoo_finance_for_price_retrieval_failure
description: Simulate KIS API price retrieval failure and verify that the system falls back to Yahoo Finance to obtain price data seamlessly without interrupting trading operations.

title: check_portfolio_manager_allocation_and_rebalancing_trigger
description: Ensure that the Portfolio Manager calculates asset allocation percentages accurately and triggers rebalancing trades when deviations exceed configured thresholds.

title: validate_scheduler_market_open_detection_and_timing
description: Test the Scheduler utility to confirm it accurately detects US market open/close status based on US/Eastern timezone and correctly calculates time until next market open.

title: verify_bot_controller_telegram_command_responses
description: Test that the Bot Controller correctly handles Telegram commands such as /status and /balance, returning accurate and timely responses to users.

title: test_trade_execution_and_simulation_modes
description: Verify that buy and sell orders are executed successfully during market hours and that simulation and accelerated run modes function correctly without dependence on actual market open times.

title: check_database_integration_and_persistence
description: Ensure that the SQLite database (dashboard/trading.db) is created or connected at bot start and that all trade activities and portfolio snapshots are persistently recorded for audit and analysis.

title: validate_environment_variable_configuration_and_validation
description: Test that environment variables including TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN, TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID, and KIS API keys are correctly set and validated by the bot before trading operations commence.

title: verify_telegram_notifications_for_bot_events
description: Ensure that the bot sends real-time Telegram notifications for key events such as bot start, trade executions, and error occurrences to keep users informed.
